Uses of Interface
org.jvoicexml.GrammarImplementation

Packages that use GrammarImplementation
org.jvoicexml This package contains the user relevant interfaces and classes to interact with the JVoiceXML VoiceXML interpreter. 
org.jvoicexml.implementation.jsapi10 This package contains basic classes to support JSAPI 1.0 implementations for UserInput and SystemOutput. 
org.jvoicexml.interpreter This package contains the core interpreter. 
org.jvoicexml.interpreter.grammar This package contains the classes to handle the grammars. 
org.jvoicexml.interpreter.grammar.transformer This package contains the classes to transoform the supported grammars, implementing GrammarTransformer. 
 

Uses of GrammarImplementation in org.jvoicexml
 

Methods in org.jvoicexml that return GrammarImplementation
 GrammarImplementation<? extends Object> SpokenInput.loadGrammar(Reader reader, GrammarType type)
          Creates a GrammarImplementation from the contents provided by the Reader.
 GrammarImplementation<? extends Object> SpokenInput.newGrammar(String name, GrammarType type)
          Creates a new grammar of the given type for this recognizer with a specified grammar name.
 

Method parameters in org.jvoicexml with type arguments of type GrammarImplementation
 void SpokenInput.activateGrammars(Collection<GrammarImplementation<? extends Object>> grammars)
          Activates the given grammars.
 void SpokenInput.deactivateGrammars(Collection<GrammarImplementation<? extends Object>> grammars)
          Deactivates the given grammar.
